# Draft:Glyphs (software)

| latest release date =
| platform = macOS
| website =
}}
Glyphs, also known as Glyphs.app, is a font editor developed by Georg Seifert and available on macOS. Glyphs uses AFDKO to generate OpenType features. A lighter version called "Glyphs Mini" is also available.
